name: Robomaster Robotic
description:
History:

Robomaster Robotic was founded in the fall semester of 2018 by Computer Engineering students Zimo Ding (20').  At that time, it operated under the advisement of Dr. Song and Professor Kalafatis. The purpose of our organization is to attend the Robomaster robotic competition(sponsored by DJI company. ) that held in Shenzhen, China.   We not only offer those students who interested in robotic have more hands-on experience but also have a chance to compete with elite engineers from all over the world.

This organization consists of the Core team and the Preparation team. The core team is for students have a lot of experience on robotic and willing to spend much effort on competition and the preparation team is for students just start to study robotic and interested in Robomaster Competition.
